Each unit is salt-resistant, color-consistent, and built with superior interlocking strength. Available in a wide range of shapes, finishes, and colors, the collection complements any architectural style. Choose <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.techo-bloc.com/hd2">HD technology</a> for enhanced density and refined surface texture, or <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.techo-bloc.com/klean-bloc-technology">Klean-Bloc</a> for advanced stain and wear protection.<o:p></o:p></p><h2 class="MsoNormal"><strong>Driveway Pavers</strong><o:p></o:p></h2><p class="MsoNormal">The Techo-Blocs <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.techo-bloc.com/shop/driveway">driveway pavers</a> combine structural strength with refined surface textures that resist fading, cracking, and tire abrasion. Available in a range of colors, finishes, and modular shapes, they allow custom designs, from geometric mosaics to seamless contemporary layouts, that tie together architecture and landscape. Modern paving systems make the driveway a true design feature, not just a functional surface.<o:p></o:p></p><h2 class="MsoNormal"><strong>Patio Pavers</strong><o:p></o:p></h2><p class="MsoNormal">Techo-Bloc <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.techo-bloc.com/shop/patio-terrace">patio pavers</a> combine natural texture with structural strength, offering a vast range of colors, finishes, and sizes to match any landscape design. Their interlocking systems enable versatile layouts, from pool decks and garden paths to raised fire pits, ensuring stability, easy installation, and long-term beauty. Designed for customization, each paver supports the creation of intimate, functional spaces built to last.<o:p></o:p></p><h2 class="MsoNormal"><strong>Permeable pavers</strong><o:p></o:p></h2><p class="MsoNormal">Techo-Bloc <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.techo-bloc.com/permeable-pavement">permeable pavers</a> deliver engineered drainage performance within a durable, modular system. Each paving unit directs rainwater through surface joints into the soil, reducing runoff and supporting stormwater management standards. Built for durability against freezethaw cycles, these pavers combine structural integrity with subtle textures and tones. By integrating design precision with natural water control, Techo-Bloc helps homeowners create sustainable, low-maintenance landscapes that manage water beautifully and efficiently.<o:p></o:p></p><h2 class="MsoNormal"><strong>FAQ</strong><o:p></o:p></h2><p class="MsoNormal"><strong>What is the difference between a concrete paver and a concrete slab?</strong><o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal">A concrete paver has a maximum aspect ratio of 4:1 and a minimum thickness of 2 inches (60 mm), allowing it to be handled easily with one hand. A concrete slab, by contrast, exceeds a 4:1 aspect ratio and typically starts at 2 inches (50 mm) thick, making it larger and heavier for use in broader surface applications.<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><strong>How does a patio paver differ from a driveway paver?</strong><o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal">A driveway paver is engineered for vehicular loads with higher density and compressive strength, while a patio paver is designed for pedestrian use only. However, all Techo-Bloc pavers are dual-purpose, built to support both foot and light-vehicle traffic for flexible design applications.</p><p class="MsoNormal"><strong>Which paver color minimizes heat absorption? </strong><br>Light-toned paverssuch as beige or greyed nickelreflect more sunlight, which helps reduce the amount of heat absorbed by the surface. This keeps patios and driveways cooler and helps minimize the heat island effect.<o:p></o:p><o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><strong>Can pavers be installed over existing concrete slabs?</strong><o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal">Yes, pavers and slabs can be laid over structurally sound concrete slabs if the existing base is well-drained and free of cracks. Using a bonding mortar layer or sand-setting bed ensures secure adhesion and long-term stability.<o:p></o:p><o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><strong>Can natural stone pavers handle heavy vehicle loads?</strong><o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal">We do not currently have a driveway rated natural stone product that can be installed on a hybrid or traditional that supports vehicular loads. Our current natural stone collection is for pedestrian installations<o:p></o:p></p></div></div><div class="roc-visually-hidden" role="status" aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true"></div></div></div></div>

metadata.title: Pavers | Techo-Bloc
metadata.meta_description: All Techo-Bloc pavers and paving stones are designed to withstand vehicular traffic, are salt-resistant and color-consistent all the way through.
